title: The climb was real
body:
10 win streak in rank atm with 3 from 3 silver promos I would like to thank matchmaking for giving me half decent teams during this time, much love xoxo 

(anyone who says elo hell is real, I was given bronze 4 after placements and within 1 week climbed to silver. I'm not that good a player either)

replies.body: But... but... OP... THE ELO BIBLE SAYS ITS REAL.

I DARE you to get to gold promos....... You will know the struggle when you get total trolls when you're just about at 100 points and you drop until you're at a negative 0 5 loss streak... Then proceed to almost get to gold promos again ti find that matchmaking is actually trolling you at this point and it is laughing it's head off at you clawing at the next Tier. You will know elo hell.

This is my story of ranked.
> When i first started ranked, i just played anything.
> 
> Got Bronze II.
> 
> I was unhappy with the results so i went to train in Norms.
> 
> After like 3-5 months of playing a variety i started ranked again.
> 
> I achieved Silver II in less than 3 days.

This proves that experience is really useful.

3 days.. daaayum good effort.

@OP: GLHF BELIEB IN YOURSELF
TY and best of luck to you also sir!

Yeah same, I started playing very late season 2 got to level 30 by mid season 3 started rank ended up silver after placements that season. But I was amateur at that point and never find myself climbing ranks. so I stopped playing ranked and did the same thing as you last season. come back this season and find I can climb my way out of bronze which I guess is something, I won't stop here though have my sights set on gold for now.
